selectPermissionsForm.facilityPermission: How will you be using Kolibri? You can customize these settings later.

selectPermissionsForm.selfManagedSetupDe: For libraries, orphanages, correctional facilities, youth centers, computer labs, and other non-formal learning contexts
selectPermissionsForm.informalSetupDescr: For parent-child learning, homeschooling, or supplementary individual learning

selectPermissionsForm.enabledAccountEdit: Users can edit their account information
selectPermissionsForm.disabledAccountEdi: Users cannot edit their account information
selectPermissionsForm.enabledUserPasswor: Users can sign in without their passwords
selectPermissionsForm.enabledUserSelfSig: Guests can create their own accounts
selectPermissionsForm.disabledUserSelfSi: Admins must create all user accounts

facilityNameForm.facilityNamingFormDescr: A Facility is the location where you are installing Kolibri, such as a school or training center.
